title: Digital Microfluidics Controller
shortDesc: A 4-layer PCB and user-friendly LabVIEW GUI for moving milk droplets with high voltage electric fields.
I developed and tested this digital microfluidic device for my research experiments.
fullDesc: Digital microfluidic technology has become a popular platform for point-of-care diagnostics as it allows automated processing of droplet sized samples - my research focuses on the development of this technology. Thus, I have created and tested a 4 layer PCB and user-friendly GUI software for easily configuring and automating experiments on the chip.

title: This Portfolio Website!
shortDesc: This site features mobile first design and was built using React (with hooks), Redux, React-Router, React-Transition-Group and SASS.
I hope you enjoy visiting this site half as much as I did making it!
fullDesc: Created with mobile first design, this site was built with React, Redux, React-Router, React-Transition-Group and SASS. Using purely functional components, I dug into React Hooks and Redux store management. This site was a joy to build and I hope you enjoy viewing it half as much as I did making it!

title: Win32 Sudoku Solver
shortDesc: Watch a DFS back-tracking algorithm at work as it solves a sudoku!
Built in C with Win32 API for maximum efficiency and lightweight file size.
This program applies event driven programming and multithreading.
fullDesc: A super lightweight application to visualize the DFS back-tracking algorithm at work! The user can provide a sudoku puzzle (or load from application's local memory), set the solving speed and watch the process. Developed in C and Win32, this project allowed me to deeply understand event driven programming and the basics of multithreading.

title: ARM Cortex M4 Drivers
shortDesc: Bare-metal programming of various peripheral APIs including IRQ configuration SPI, I2C, UART/USART and Timers.
The APIs have been tested on a STM32F446RE based development board.
fullDesc: I undertook this project to strengthen my understanding of the ARM Cortex M architecture and digital communication protocols. Drivers for IRQ configuration, GPIO pins, SPI, I2C, UART/USART and the System Timer have been programmed and tested on a STM32F446RE based development board.

title: LED Light Strip Controller
shortDesc: Built the firmware and PCB hardware for a multi-function decorative LED light strip controller.
User can switch between modes with button press and set parameters (e.g. colour, brightness) with potentiometers.
fullDesc: Decorative LED light strip controller built with an Arduino Nano controller on a custom 2 layer PCB. User can switch between the following 3 modes on button press: static colour, pattern display and music visualizer. Parameters including colour, brightness and sensitivity are tunable with potentiometers.

title: Literature Blog - rahulscorner.me
shortDesc: My personal blog website about the books which have shaped my life!
fullDesc: My personal blog where I share articles and recommendations of books that have shaped my life! Built using React (with hooks), React-Router, React-Helmet and SASS. The site features light and dark modes. An earlier version built with PHP7 and vanilla JS is available at my github.

title: Rubikloud - Retail Predictions
shortDesc: The task was to take a dataset of transactions and predict each customer's likelihood of purchasing from a top 5 brand.
Experimenting with Scikit-Learn resulted in a random-forest classifier achieving a 0.946 AUC on test data.
fullDesc: The final project in my introductory machine learning course. Given a dataset of over 1 million anonimized retail transactions, I was tasked with predicting each customer's likelihood to purchase from a top 5 brand during a 3 month period. Evaluated on the test data, a random forest model produced the best ROC curve with average AUC of 0.946.

title: OTTOGROW Hydroponics Grower
shortDesc: A complete hardware and software solution for regulating nutrient ion concentration in hydroponic growing systems.
Uses an Ion-Selective-Electrode sensor and user configrable set-points to autonomously control ion concentration.
fullDesc: A complete hardware and software solution for regulating nutrient ion concentration in hydroponic growing systems. Presented as my capstone engineering project, this device used a closed loop control system to keep nutrient concentrations in irrigation fluid within a user determined concentration range. Using an ISE sensor, solenoid valve actuation, Arduino microcontroller and LabVIEW UI.
